notes:
Data about UNHCR's populations of concern residing in Belize. There are six types of data available (by year, unless otherwise noted): 

1. Persons of concern

2. Time-series data for refugees

3. Demographic profile of refugees

4. Refugee status determination for asylum seekers

5. Number of asylum seekers (by month).

6. Refugees resettled.

The source data comes from the [UNHCR Population Statistics](http://popstats.unhcr.org/en/overview) portal.
